h1_title: How to Unlock the Zodiac Village and Upgrade Armor
h2_title: How to Unlock Zodiac Village in The Painted Realm
content: In Chapter 3, you'll arrive at a snowy beach near the Bitter Lake accompanied by an NPC called Admiral Bajie. If you turn back on yourself from the North Shore of the Bitter Lake shrine and go right to the end, you'll see a hut in the distance.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Zodiac_Village_and_Upgrade_Armor.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Zodiac Village and Upgrade Armor', specifically from the subsection 'How to Unlock Zodiac Village in The Painted Realm'.
The content is as follows:
In Chapter 3, you'll arrive at a snowy beach near the Bitter Lake accompanied by an NPC called Admiral Bajie. If you turn back on yourself from the North Shore of the Bitter Lake shrine and go right to the end, you'll see a hut in the distance.
